title: The George Foreman 5-Serving Removable Plate Grill
description: Serve the entire family a variety of foods on the George Foreman® 5-Serving, Classic Plate Grill. The 2-n-1 Grill and Panini feature includes a 1.5” adjustable cooking height hinge for cooking juicy burgers or thick sandwiches. The George Tough™ nonstick coating and dishwasher-safe removable plates make clean-up a breeze while the exclusive slope design removes 42% of fat from uncooked ¼ lb 80/20 Ground Chuck burgers.

asset.author: George Foreman Cooking
asset.description:
Serve the entire family a variety of foods on the George Foreman® 5-Serving, Classic Plate Grill. The 2-n-1 Grill and Panini feature includes a 1.5” adjustable cooking height hinge for cooking juicy burgers or thick sandwiches. The George Tough™ nonstick coating and dishwasher-safe removable plates make clean-up a breeze while the exclusive slope design removes 42% of fat from uncooked ¼ lb 80/20 Ground Chuck burgers. 

Learn more here: http://www.georgeforemancooking.com/products/removable-plate-grills/grp2841r-5-serving-removable-plate-grill.aspx

transcripts: George Foreman fast easy grilling at home. The George Foreman 5-serving removable plate grill creates delicious meals for the whole family without the mess. Variable temperature controls allow for precision control cooking for meat and vegetables or toasting up a panini the durable grilling plates easily remove with the quick-release handles then they can be placed in the dishwasher for fast and simple clean up and the duel grilling surfaces let you cook in half the time it takes to pan-fry. Keep it low fat with whatever you're grilling the George tough nonstick grilling surface removes the need for excess oil and butter plus its durable and easy to wipe clean. The one-and-a-half inch floating hinge allows for even cooking of thick cuts off meat and sandwiches and the adjustable leg allows you to grill on a slope or a flat surface remove up to 42 percent of fat using the slope surface when you grill meat and burgers dual indicator lights show when the grill is plugged in and when it's preheated which typically takes just five minutes the George Foreman 5 serving removable plate grill reliable grilling for fast tasty meals.
